TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ImportCollection extends System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionBaseCollection

Docs.summary: Provides a collection of instances of the class representing documents to be imported into the XML Web service. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Import> class corresponds to the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) `<import>` element that is enclosed by the root `<definitions>` element. For more information about WSDL, see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
## Examples The following example demonstrates a typical use of the `ImportCollection` class.
[!code-cpp[ImportCollection_6#1](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/t-system.web.services.de_37_1.cpp)] [!code-vb[ImportCollection_6#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.web.services.de_37_1.vb)] [!code-cs[ImportCollection_6#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.web.services.de_37_1.cs)]

MemberSignature.Value: public void Insert (int index, System.Web.Services.Description.Import import);
.method public hidebysig instance void Insert(int32 index, class System.Web.Services.Description.Import import) cil managed

Docs.param: The zero-based index at which to insert the `import` parameter.
The to add to the collection.
Docs.summary: Adds the specified instance to the at the specified zero-based index.

remarks.format:
## Remarks If the number of items in the collection already equals the collection's capacity, the capacity is doubled by automatically reallocating the internal array before the new element is inserted.
If the `index` parameter is equal to <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>, the `import` parameter is added to the end of the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ImportCollection>.
The elements after the insertion point move down to accommodate the new element.
## Examples The following example demonstrates the use of the `Insert` method. To view the source for the user-defined `CreateImport` method, see the example included with the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Import> class.

Docs.exception:
The parameter is less than zero.
\- or -
The parameter is greater than <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Remove(class System.Web.Services.Description.Import import) cil managed

Docs.param: The to remove from the collection.
Docs.summary: Removes the first occurrence of the specified from the .

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method performs a linear search; therefore, the average execution time is proportional to <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>.
The elements that follow the removed <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Import> move up to occupy the vacated spot.
